attributes.action: Stop the use of BCE in place of BC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an effort to rewrite history and pretend that Jesus did not exist (although exhaustively historically proven), and become politically correct, institutions have started to use BCE (Before the Common Era) instead of BC (Before Christ), this is an abhorrent practice and should be stopped immediately. This is grossly insensitive to Christians, as well as to Muslims who acknowledge Him.
